channel.title: Help
channel.description:
Help whenever i try to log into my server i get error conecting to serveri go no ip & portforwarding but it just wont work what am i doing worng
Will REP++
Adding another questoi :) Is there any way i can play my server on local host for like editing i am useing Dragon History X or somthing

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @minymo minymo
item.description:
@minymo wrote:

[quote=“Beastly¿, post:7, topic:293294”]Are you sure you have port forwarded correctly?

If your not sure, just visit here*.

    • Moderators, Global Moderators, Administrators, sorry if it counts as advertising. Although I do not know why or how it is linked to advertising.

Hope this helped.[/quote]
I got a port check from that site and it said my port was up
i tryed a 508 cilent with my server said online then when i tryed to log in i got
NO response please try a differnt world same as my 317 client [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2009, 06:15:42 am[/size][hr][quote=“minymo”][quote author=Beastly¿ link=topic=388095.msg2902266#msg2902266 date=1249596139]
Are you sure you have port forwarded correctly?

If your not sure, just visit here*.

    • Moderators, Global Moderators, Administrators, sorry if it counts as advertising. Although I do not know why or how it is linked to advertising.

Hope this helped.
[/quote]
I got a port check from that site and it said my port was up
i tryed a 508 cilent with my server said online then when i tryed to log in i got
NO response please try a differnt world same as my 317 client[/quote]
Any tips
BUMP[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2009, 10:20:31 am[/size][hr]BUMP

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @minymo minymo
item.description:
@minymo wrote:

[quote=“raped by who, post:5, topic:293294”][QUOTE]steps to getting your server up and online

add ip to no-ip.com
Portforword if needed
Run the server by pressing run
use your client to log in with the right port

to check your port go to the server.class and search for it
its probably wit 5555 or 43594

hope i helped[/QUOTE]

Sounds to me like you just copied what he said, and then stated obvious facts.[/quote]
Dont spam my topic and state the obisus

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @minymo minymo
item.description:
@minymo wrote:

[quote=“Sir Jay, post:2, topic:293294”][quote author=minymo link=topic=388095.msg2901713#msg2901713 date=1249566621]
Help whenever i try to log into my server i get error conecting to serveri go no ip & portforwarding but it just wont work what am i doing worng
[/quote]
Didn’t work still got error conecting to server

IP: 127.0.0.1
Use it to connect to your own server from the computer you are hosting it on.[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2009, 08:09:04 am[/size][hr]Sorry fo the double post but now i am getting this thing saying no response from server please try a differnt world

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

minymo:

Help whenever i try to log into my server i get error conecting to serveri go no ip & portforwarding but it just wont work what am i doing worng

IP: 127.0.0.1
Use it to connect to your own server from the computer you are hosting it on.

Read full topic
